title: Magic Tower: Cards War
description: Magic Tower: Cards War is a strategic battle game where you must protect the princess so she doesn't get killed by the enemies. Get a deck of fighters and place them in the correct position to win. Combine two of the same units and get a mega-unit! There are also buffers or bonuses to strengthen your troops. Use your tactical skills because each decision gets you closer to victory. Will you successfully protect the princess?
